title: UnitedHealth’s Optum Rx PBM To Coax Patients To Less Pricey Biosimilars Of Abbvie’s Humira
description: UnitedHealth Group’s OptumRx PBM will put biosimilar versions of Abbvie’s expensive rheumatoid arthritis drug Humira “in the same position as the brand” on the PBM’s preferred list of drugs known as a formulary, in 2023.

title: Cohesity - Leapfrogging The Competition In Data Security And Management

title: RØDE Updates Its Classic NT-USB Condenser Mic For Podcasters
description: Australian audio brand RØDE has updated its classic USB condenser microphone with the all-new NT-USB+. The new version features a USB-C connection, APHEX processing effects and RØDE's whisper-quiet Revolution preamp.

title: The Pope Of Jack London Square Wants To Cut Your Hair
